bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of qi depletion leading to a loss of strength, which in turn causes the qi dynamic and inner organs to slow down or get stuck in their activities, with diarrhea and sagging inner organs as further results. Yi xue zheng chuan 醫學正傳 1: 其或泄痢，脫肛後 重，大孔痛不可忍，是為氣下陷也 , “When outflow and free-flux illness, prolapse of the rectum and a feeling of heaviness at the behind, and unbearable pain at the anus develop, this is because of a qi downfall ”.
